A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Mixed bag for me. Lots to like\, some stuff to love\, and some stuff which\, like TFA\, made you go.... \"Why? Why have that?\" or \"Why not save that for later?\"\n\nTo be brief\, the film has flaws which are\, unfortunately\, quite glaring. But to its credit\, the film also takes a lot of risks to tell its story. It doesn't give the fans everything they want. It follows its own path\, take it or leave it.
